attributes.action: allow landlords owners of Bars/Clubs and pubs to decide if they want it to be a no smoking venue.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the public are upset by the nanny culture that is changing the fabric of society today and would like to put a halt on this to give us our freedoms back. To give us the right to choose what we do and where we do it. With the example above It is wrong to enforce a ban on smoking within public houses, this is an attack on the civil liberties of the public that smoke, and reducing them to sitting outside, in huts, or waiting for 20 minutes in a cue to get out of a club to have a quick smoke!?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
